pr_title: Verify that next page is not empty in the history iterator

timeline.message: Verify that next page is not empty in the history iterator

timeline.bodyText: I think you can avoid this call here if line 111 calls this.hasNext
timeline.author: mfateev

replies.bodyText:
That call is to current.hasNext() (not this.hasNext()), which is just cached history.
We should make a server call if current is empty and page token is available.
This would make it possible to safely call it.next() without calling it.hasNext() first.
That being said I've updated implementation, added tests and verified that it's working in bench, please take a look
replies.author: vitarb

timeline.message: Verify that next page is not empty in the history iterator

replies.bodyText: Simplified the code a bit, but kept behavior same.
